{{For|the [[Dark Souls III]] variant|Black Leather Boots (Dark Souls III)}}
The '''Black Leather Boots''' are [[:Category:Dark Souls: Legs Armor|legs armor]] in ''[[Dark Souls]]''. They are part of the [[Black Leather Set]].

{{Description
|First paragraph = These boots made of smooth black leather are extremely quiet, a good thing for those who hide in the shadows.
|Second paragraph = The leather itself is thick, offering a decent level of protection.
}}
==Availability==
*Starting equipment for the [[Thief]] [[Classes (Dark Souls)|class]].
*Lower [[Undead Burg]], in one of the buildings that aÂ [[Hollow Thief]] is in.

==Characteristics==
*Has a different appearance depending on the player's gender.

==Notes==
*Grants 100 [[Soul (Dark Souls)|souls]] when fed to [[Kingseeker Frampt]].

==Upgrades==
Requires 200 [[Soul (Dark Souls)|souls]] per upgrade.
